settings.title: Improve Deep Sleep
settings.content: Rich in beneficial nutrients, including Glycine and Essential Fatty Acids, which support a deeper, more restorative sleep.

settings.title: Energized Wake Cycle
settings.content: B-vitamins and Heme Iron, which play key roles in enhancing metabolic functions for optimized wake cycles and sustained daytime energy.

settings.title: Supports Melatonin Regulation
settings.content: Contains vital nutrients to support natural melatonin production for improved sleep and wake cycles.

settings.title: Bioavailable Nutrients
settings.content: Highly bioavailable micronutrients from natural sources deliver superior absorption, maximizing nutrient utilization for optimal sleep benefits.

IS THE SLEEP STACK FOR ME?

This stack is ideal for individuals who are seeking comprehensive nutritional support  to achieve deep, restorative sleep, and optimized wake times.

settings.quote: My nails seem to be growing stronger. I noticed I’m sleeping more soundly, and have more energy...
settings.author: Linda S.

settings.supporting_product_description: Bone Marrow & Liver is packed with vital nutrients and peptides to provide support for bone and tissue repair, skin health, and better mood.
Histamine & Immune provides strategic immune support, and helps to stimulate your immune fighting cells to defeat viruses and pathogens.

settings.primary_product_description: Skin, Hair & Nails is packed with vital nutrients and peptides to support healthy (and beautiful) skin, hair, and nails. Grass-fed & finished cartilage, liver, and bone marrow stimulate collagen production and reduce inflammation.

settings.title: Full-spectrum collagen (Type I-V & XI)
settings.nutrient_description: Bovine-derived collagen is critical in supporting and maintaining the overall health of your joints, skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Fat-soluble Vitamins A & E
settings.nutrient_description: Necessary for optimal skin health, protection against dryness, and wound healing.

settings.title: Glycine
settings.nutrient_description: A crucial amino acid that supports collagen production, stimulation, and acts as a natural moisturizing factor.

settings.title: Biotin
settings.nutrient_description: Protects cells from damage and water loss as well as improves moisture retention for our skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Hyaluronan (Hyaluronic Acid)
settings.nutrient_description: Controls tissue hydration, mediates repair processes, protects and lubricates soft tissues.

settings.title: Riboflavin, Folate, B12, and Choline
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for structural integrity of skin, hair, and nails, reducing inflammation, and collagen production.

settings.title: Proteoglycan
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for structural development, organization, hydration, and functional properties of the skin.

settings.title: Essential fatty acids including omega-3 fatty acids, EPA & DHA
settings.nutrient_description: Play a critical role in the immune system, nourishing skin cells, as well as reducing inflammation.

settings.title: Elastin
settings.nutrient_description: Promotes strength, firmness, and elasticity of our skin.

settings.title: Glycosaminoglycans
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for maintenance, regeneration, and regulation of our cells that comprise our skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Red and Yellow Bone Marrow
settings.nutrient_description: Abundant in peptides, growth factors, and stem cells to promote and support the formation of red blood cells, cartilage cells (chondrocytes), bone cells (osteocytes, osteoblast & osteoclasts), and other vital tissues found throughout the body.

settings.title: Alkylglycerols
settings.nutrient_description: Support the immune system and formation of red blood cells, white blood cells, and platelets.

settings.title: Adiponectin
settings.nutrient_description: Peptide hormone shown to support immune, metabolic, and cardiovascular health.

settings.title: Tissue-specific proteins, hormones, growth factors, and peptides such as bovine cathelicidins
settings.nutrient_description: Show broad antimicrobial activity and are involved in the immune response.

settings.title: Vitamins A, D, E, K2
settings.nutrient_description: Get these vitamins in a super bioavailable form that play critical roles in overall immune and bone health.

settings.title: Copper, biotin, and CoQ10
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for metabolism, mood, and energy, as well as the health of skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Liver Expressed Antimicrobial Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as LEAP-2. This peptide is involved in immune response and glucose metabolism.

settings.title: Hepcidin Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: A peptide directly involved in iron metabolism as well as the innate immune response.

settings.title: Ergothioneine Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: An amino acid found in liver, kidney, and bone marrow found to support detoxification and longevity pathways.

settings.title: Thymopoietin and Thymulin
settings.nutrient_description: Essential peptides for immune cell programming and activation of the immune system.

settings.title: Diamine Oxidase (DAO)
settings.nutrient_description: Supports overall immune health, histamine metabolism, and digestion.

settings.title: Thymosin fraction 5 and thymosin alpha-1
settings.nutrient_description: Peptides that are potent stimulators of the immune system and enhance immune cell functioning.

settings.title: Thymosin beta-4
settings.nutrient_description: Important peptide in stimulating pituitary hormones essential for reproductive function.

settings.title: Thymic humoral factor
settings.nutrient_description: Increases the immune response, especially to viruses.

settings.title: Kidney-specific peptides
settings.nutrient_description: Reduce the concentration of oxalates in the urine and calcium deposits in the renal tissue, as well as preventing free-radical induced damage.

settings.title: Bovine Beta-Defensins and Cathelicidins
settings.nutrient_description: Peptides known to have broad antimicrobial roles in the body.

settings.title: Splenin, Tuftsin and Splenopentin Peptides
settings.nutrient_description: Peptides exclusively found in splenic tissue which enhance immune function.

settings.title: Heme iron
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for brain health, energy, and exercise performance, as well as immune function.

settings.title: Niacin
settings.nutrient_description: A B3 vitamin essential for cardiovascular health, mood, cognition, and energy.

settings.title: Selenium
settings.nutrient_description: A critical mineral for thyroid function (iodothyronine deiodinanses) and immune health/antioxidant defense (glutathione peroxidase, thioredoxin reductase).

settings.section_description: The combined power of Skin, Hair & Nails, Bone Marrow & Liver, and Histamine & Immune includes vital and potent essential nutrients.

settings.quote: What a burst of energy and my skin is looking amazing. After one week, my sleep pattern is much better and I feel more rested.
settings.author: April M.

settings.title: HEART & SOIL 101
settings.instructions: Take 6 capsules, once daily, of each supplement. If you’re new to taking organ supplements, start with 1-2 capsules of each daily for the first week before increasing by one capsule daily. Consistent long-term use provides the best results.
settings.benefits: The unique combination of organs within this stack aims to support optimal sleep and wake cycles.
settings.quality: Rigorous third-party testing by independent labs during and after manufacturing. Quality and purity information can be provided upon request.
settings.dietary: 100% additive, hormone, allergen, antibiotic, pesticide, and GMO-free. Freeze-dried. Pure nose-to-tail nourishment.

settings.title: Who should take the Sleep Stack?
settings.answer: This stack is intended for those seeking comprehensive nutritional support for optimal sleep and wake cycles.

settings.title: What are the benefits of taking all three supplements together?
settings.answer: The combination of products in this stack work synergistically to deliver a wide range of highly bioavailable Vitamins, Minerals, Peptides, and Essential Fatty Acids that support optimal sleep and wake cycles.
